channel.title: Portfolio & Blog of Gerard Cruz
channel.description: Hello, I'm Gerard Cruz. I'm a web developer, designer, and musician. This is my portfolio & blog.

item.title: Testing new post
item.description:
I’m testing out making a new post. Huh, I hope this works.

I’m starting to like vim. I should use it more often.

item.title: Finally finished my blog
item.description:
I’ve finally made a blog and portfolio for myself. It was pretty easy with Jekyll; I love how easy it is to setup. I have no idea what to blog in the future.

Check out Jekyll’s website, or checkout their Github repo.

I hope I find things to blog soon.

item.title: New project for me!
item.description: Making a new site for a travel company. Pretty excited since I love traveling. The chat functionality will be hard tho. Let’s ruby this shiz. There’s a github page for it for my frontend tests. I hope rails can handle this. This blogging thing is so weird.
